About.title: Welcome to {name}
About.mission: We're on a mission to make online shopping easy, affordable, and delightful for everyone in Bangladesh. From electronics to fashion, we bring you quality products at the best prices.

story.title: Our Story
story.p1: {name} is a trusted online shopping platform in Bangladesh where you can find quality products at affordable prices. We believe online shopping should be easy, safe, and enjoyable.
story.p2: Our goal is to bring you the best products, offer competitive prices, and provide exceptional customer service. Every product is carefully selected to ensure you get the best experience.
story.developedBy: This store is developed by <link>DigitalCare Team</link> ‚Äî we build modern business solutions using the latest technology.

values.title: What We Stand For
values.subtitle: Our core values guide everything we do, from product selection to customer service.

customerFirst.title: Customer First
customerFirst.desc: Every decision we make starts with our customers in mind.

quality.desc: We partner with trusted brands to bring you the best products.

bestPrices.title: Best Prices

developedBy.title: Developed By

FAQ.title: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQ.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about orders, shipping, returns, and more.

cta.title: Still have questions?
cta.desc: Our support team is available 24/7 to help you with any questions.

track.q: How can I track my order?
track.a: You can track your order by visiting the Track Order page and entering your order number. You'll also receive tracking updates via email and SMS.

delivery.a: Inside Dhaka: 2-3 business days. Outside Dhaka: 3-5 business days. Express delivery options are available at checkout for faster delivery.

shipping.a: Yes! We offer free shipping on all orders above ‡ß≥1000. Orders below this amount have a flat shipping fee of ‡ß≥60 (Dhaka) or ‡ß≥120 (Outside Dhaka).

address.q: Can I change my delivery address after placing an order?
address.a: You can change your delivery address within 2 hours of placing your order by contacting our support team. After this window, changes may not be possible if the order has already been processed.

policy.a: We offer a 7-day return policy for most items. Products must be unused, in original packaging, and with all tags attached. Some items like undergarments and perishables are non-returnable.

initiate.q: How do I initiate a return?
initiate.a: Go to your Orders page, select the order, and click 'Return Item'. Follow the instructions to print your return label and schedule a pickup or drop-off.

refund.q: How long does a refund take?
refund.a: Refunds are processed within 5-7 business days after we receive and inspect the returned item. The amount will be credited to your original payment method.

exchange.q: Can I exchange an item instead of returning it?
exchange.a: Yes! During the return process, you can choose to exchange for a different size or color. We'll ship the replacement as soon as we receive your return.

methods.q: What payment methods do you accept?
methods.a: We accept bKash, Nagad, Visa, Mastercard, American Express, and Cash on Delivery (COD). All online payments are secured with SSL encryption.

cod.q: Is Cash on Delivery available everywhere?
cod.a: COD is available for most locations in Bangladesh. Some remote areas may have COD restrictions. You'll see available payment options at checkout based on your delivery address.

charges.q: Are there any extra charges for Cash on Delivery?
charges.a: There's a small COD fee of ‡ß≥20 per order. This helps cover the additional logistics costs for handling cash payments.

secure.a: Absolutely! We use industry-standard SSL encryption and never store your card details. All transactions are processed through secure, PCI-compliant payment gateways.

create.q: How do I create an account?
create.a: Click the 'Sign Up' button in the header, enter your email and create a password. You can also sign up quickly using your Google account.

forgot.q: I forgot my password. How do I reset it?
forgot.a: Click 'Forgot Password' on the login page, enter your email, and we'll send you a reset link. The link is valid for 24 hours.

guest.q: Can I order without creating an account?
guest.a: Currently, you need an account to place orders. This helps us track your orders and provide better support. Creating an account takes less than a minute!

delete.q: How do I delete my account?
delete.a: Contact our support team to request account deletion. We'll process your request within 48 hours and confirm via email.

Privacy.title: Privacy Policy

meta.title: Privacy Policy
meta.description: Learn about how {name} collects, uses, and protects your personal information.

Privacy.intro: At {name}, we collect information to provide better services to our users. The types of information we collect include:

1.title: 1. Information We Collect
list: Personal Information: Name, email address, phone number, shipping address
Payment Information: Credit card details (processed securely through payment gateways)
Usage Data: Pages visited, time spent on site, browser type
Device Information: IP address, device type, operating system

2.title: 2. How We Use Your Information
2.content: We use the information we collect for the following purposes:
list: Communicating with you about orders, products, and services
Improving our website and customer experience

3.title: 3. Information Sharing
3.content: We do not sell your personal information to third parties. We may share your information with:
list: Legal Requirements: When required by law or to protect our rights
Business Transfers: In case of merger or acquisition

4.title: 4. Data Security
4.content: We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your personal information:
list: SSL encryption for all data transmission
Secure payment processing through trusted gateways
Limited access to personal data by authorized personnel only

5.title: 5. Cookies
5.content: We use cookies to enhance your browsing experience. Cookies help us:
list: Remember your preferences and cart items
Analyze website traffic and usage patterns
5.note: You can control cookie settings through your browser. Disabling cookies may affect some features of our website.

6.title: 6. Your Rights
list: Access the personal information we hold about you
Request deletion of your data (subject to legal requirements)

7.title: 7. Children's Privacy
7.content: Our services are not intended for children under 13. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13. If you believe we have collected such information, please contact us immediately.

8.title: 8. Changes to This Policy
8.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any significant changes by posting a notice on our website or sending you an email.

9.title: 9. Contact Us
9.content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or our data practices, please contact us:

meta.title: Terms of Service
meta.description: Read the terms of service for {name}. These terms govern your use of our website and services.

1.title: 1. Introduction
1.content: Welcome to {name}. By accessing and using our website, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. Please read them carefully before using our services.

2.title: 2. Definitions
list: "Service" refers to the {name} website and all related services.
"User" refers to any individual who accesses or uses our Service.
"Products" refers to items available for purchase on our website.

3.title: 3. Account Registration
3.content: To access certain features of our Service, you may need to create an account. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account information and for all activities that occur under your account.

4.title: 4. Orders and Payment
4.content: All orders are subject to acceptance and availability. We reserve the right to refuse or cancel any order for any reason. Prices are subject to change without notice.
list: Orders are confirmed only after successful payment processing
We accept major credit cards, bKash, and Nagad
All prices are displayed in Bangladeshi Taka (BDT)

5.title: 5. Shipping and Delivery
5.content: We strive to deliver your orders within the estimated timeframe. Delivery times may vary based on location and product availability.
list: Shipping costs are calculated at checkout

6.title: 6. Returns and Refunds
6.content: We offer a 7-day return policy for most items. Products must be unused and in their original packaging. Refunds will be processed within 5-7 business days after receiving the returned item.

7.title: 7. Intellectual Property
7.content: All content on this website, including text, images, logos, and graphics, is the property of {name} and is protected by copyright laws.

8.title: 8. Limitation of Liability
8.content: {name} shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages arising out of your use of our Service.

9.title: 9. Changes to Terms
9.content: We reserve the right to modify these Terms of Service at any time. Changes will be effective immediately upon posting on our website.

10.title: 10. Contact Information
10.content: If you have any questions about these Terms, please contact us at:
